Tested platforms¶

CHarm has been successfully compiled and tested using the following hardware and software.

Known supported configurations¶

Architecture

Operating System

C Compiler

x86_64

Debian GNU/Linux 11 (bullseye)

GCC 10.2.1, Clang 11.0.1-2, ICC 2021.5.0

x86_64

Scientific Linux release 6.4 (Carbon)

GCC 7.2, GCC 6.4, GCC 5.4, GCC 4.9.3, GCC 4.8.4, GCC 4.4.7

x86_64

Manjaro Linux

GCC 11.2.0

x86_64

FreeBSD 13.0-RELEASE

Clang 11.0.1, GCC 10.3.0

x86_64

macOS Big Sur 11.4

Clang 12.0.5, GCC 10.3.0

x86_64

Windows 10 (Windows Subsystem for Linux, Debian GNU/Linux (bullseye))

GCC 10.2.1

We would love to hear your own experience, be it positive or negative, especially on platforms not listed in the table!
